name: Stupid Bat
detailed_description:
STUPID BAT
The inevitability of failure

Stupid Bat is a side-scrolling mobile game featuring 2D retro style graphics. The objective is to direct a stupid but charismatic flying bat, who moves continuously to the right, between rock columns. If the bat hits a column, you'll lose. This little bat moves upward each time that you click, but if you stop clicking it will fall because of gravity and die; You gotta help this stupid bat not to die. Stupid Bat was built with the only purpose to have a casual game that will definitely is an addictive short-term distraction from your day.
